Plot: A young queen, who is married to an insane king, falls secretly in love with her physician - and together they start a revolution that changes a nation forever.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 21 wins & 36 nominations.
Writer: Bodil Steensen-Leth (novel), Rasmus Heisterberg (screenplay), Nikolaj Arcel (screenplay)
Actors: Alicia Vikander, Mads Mikkelsen, Mikkel Boe Følsgaard, Trine Dyrholm
Title: A Royal Affair
